Documentation

(.:) :: (b -> c) -> (a -> a1 -> b) -> a -> a1 -> c

Function composition composition. Composes an arity 1 function with an arity 2 function.

dotProduct = V.sum .: (*)

Is equivalent to:

dotProduct u v = V.sum (u * v)

Angle conversions

toDegrees :: Floating a => a -> a

Converts Radians to Degrees

toRadians :: Floating a => a -> a

Converts Degrees to Radians
